content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good to meet you, Nesibe. Thank you for expressing interest in my apartment. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable, but I am looking to maximize my gains. What is your budget for renting an apartment in New York?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of 1000 Euros per month, but I am willing to negotiate. What is your offer?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for letting me know your budget. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am willing to offer you a rental price of 900 Euros per month. This is a fair market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in New York, and it reflects my desire to maximize my returns as a landlord. What do you think of this offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month. Can we sign the lease agreement now?

Thank you for your negotiation, but I think this is a fair price for the apartment. I am ready to sign the lease agreement.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, Nesibe. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. We can proceed with signing the lease agreement now. Please provide me with your contact information and any other necessary documents to complete the process. Once everything is in order, you can move into the apartment and start enjoying your new home.
name: Heinrich Heine
